description:
Trystan Bull's back, and he's ready to experience new things. Just what kind of new things are we talking about? Well, Trystan is going to go where his straight cock has never gone before: Into a man's ass!

So sit back and watch as Samuel takes advantage of Trystan as he plays on his video games while only wearing a towel...which soon falls off.

You don't get much hotter than this scene!

Enjoy!
title: Trystan's First Fuck
